name: Odour Extracting
description: This chapter of the grimoire is dedicated to odour extracting â€“ one of the most crucial processes for creating new components that any advanced warlock must master. $(br2)The first thing a novice in this field needs to construct is a special $(l:odour_extracting/odour_extracting_furnace)odour extracting furnace$().
